title: Mic and speakers not working on first pixel
content: the microphone and speakers isn't working on my pixel and any video i try to play will freeze and any call i get will cause my phone not to respond due to the mic, even with my bluetooth earbuds i can only listen to videos and my mic with my bluetooth earbuds wont work on my pixel but with any other device like my pc the mic will work but the pixel's mic wont work and neither will the speaker
